entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story who is trying to ask someone out on Christmas night.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and companion who is also trying to help him figure out how to ask a girl out.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a year older than Harry and is described as very pretty, a good Quidditch player, and popular.

relationships.description: Harry has an interest in Cho, but is too nervous to ask her out.
Ron is a friend of Harry's and is trying to help him figure out how to ask a girl out.
